title: Police investigate possible homicide in Kansas City’s Northeast area
content:
Police were investigating a possible homicide after a man’s body was found early Thursday in Kansas City’s Northeast area. 

Police found the body about 12:45 a.m. Thursday near Independence and Myrtle avenues. The man had been shot, according to police. 

No suspect information was available. 

Police ask anyone with information about the man’s death to call the TIPS Hotline at 816-474-TIPS (474-8477).
